subject: Hockey, Ice
United States Open (Golf)

Golf
Tennis
lead_paragraph: After saying he would have made the save on the winning goal in Game 5 — a 1-0 Bruins loss — Canucks goalie Roberto Luongo was pulled after allowing three goals in Game 6.
snippet: After saying he would have made the save on the winning goal in Game 5 — a 1-0 Bruins loss — Canucks goalie Roberto Luongo was pulled after allowing three goals in Game 6.
